body:
Geant4 doesn't need to use the geant4-data prefix, as discussed in https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/28388#issuecomment-1018612751

Tested that this still picks up the data files through the environment variables and works fine.

Maintainer: @drbenmorgan
title: geant4: GEANT4_INSTALL_DATA=OFF and depends_on geant4-data type=run
